Package com.bteam.common.services

Class CommandValidator

java.lang.Object
com.bteam.common.services.CommandValidator
public class CommandValidator extends Object
A service class providing methods for move validation

  • Method Details

    • validateCommands

      public static ValidationResult validateCommands(List<CharacterEntity> characters, List<MovementDataModel> intendedMovements, List<AttackDataModel> intendedAttacks, GridService gridService, String hostID)
      Test all commands for their legality.

      Check for any illegal movements using validateMovements(java.util.List<com.bteam.common.models.MovementDataModel>, java.util.List<com.bteam.common.entities.CharacterEntity>, com.bteam.common.models.GridService, java.lang.String), validateAttacks(java.util.List<com.bteam.common.models.AttackDataModel>, java.util.List<com.bteam.common.entities.CharacterEntity>, com.bteam.common.models.GridService, java.lang.String) and validateSingleCommandsOnly(java.util.List<com.bteam.common.models.MovementDataModel>, java.util.List<com.bteam.common.models.AttackDataModel>) and collect movement conflicts ("bounces") between opposing players using opposingPlayersMovingToSamePosition(java.util.List<com.bteam.common.entities.CharacterEntity>, java.util.List<com.bteam.common.models.MovementDataModel>)

      Parameters:
      characters - all characters
      intendedMovements - all intended movements
      intendedAttacks - all intended attacks
      gridService - gridService containing the playing field
      hostID - the playerID of the host
      Returns:
      TurnResult with unaltered characters but only valid movements and attacks as well as a list of movement conflicts between players

    • validateMovements

      public static List<MovementDataModel> validateMovements(List<MovementDataModel> intendedMovements, List<CharacterEntity> characters, GridService gridService, String hostID)
      Check a List of movements.

      Check for any of the following illegal movements:

      • Trying to move multiple characters to the same position
      • Trying to move to where another character already is
      • Out of bounds regarding grid map
      • Forbidden movement pattern based on an entities CharacterDataModel and their position based on the characters argument
      Parameters:
      intendedMovements - list of movements
      characters - list of all characters, including those that aren't moved
      gridService - grid service containing the playing field
      hostID - the playerID of the host
      Returns:
      valid movements, without collisions between opposing players' characters (done separately by opposingPlayersMovingToSamePosition(java.util.List<com.bteam.common.entities.CharacterEntity>, java.util.List<com.bteam.common.models.MovementDataModel>))

    • validateAttacks

      public static List<AttackDataModel> validateAttacks(List<AttackDataModel> intendedAttacks, List<CharacterEntity> characters, GridService gridService, String hostID)
      Check the validity of attacks and only return those that are legal

      Check for any of the following illegal attacks:

      • Out of Bounds (Grid map)
      • Forbidden Attack Pattern
      Parameters:
      intendedAttacks - list of attacks
      characters - list of all characters
      gridService - grid service containing the playing field
      hostID - the playerID of the host
      Returns:
      a list of legal attacks

    • validateSingleCommandsOnly

      public static Pair<List<MovementDataModel>,List<AttackDataModel>> validateSingleCommandsOnly(List<MovementDataModel> intendedMovements, List<AttackDataModel> intendedAttacks)
      Makes sure there aren't multiple commands to the same entity.

      If there are multiple commands to one entity, they are all removed.

      Parameters:
      intendedMovements - the intended movements
      intendedAttacks - the intended attacks
      Returns:
      pair of cleaned MovementDataModels and AttackDataModels

    • opposingPlayersMovingToSamePosition

      public static List<PairNoOrder<MovementDataModel,MovementDataModel>> opposingPlayersMovingToSamePosition(List<CharacterEntity> characterEntities, List<MovementDataModel> intendedMovements)
      Test if opposing players are moving their characters to the same position.

      The result will only contain pairs, since the input should either be preprocessed by validateMovingToSamePosition(java.util.List<com.bteam.common.models.MovementDataModel>, java.util.List<com.bteam.common.entities.CharacterEntity>) or be free of such problems in the first place

      Parameters:
      characterEntities - The character entities (for player reference)
      intendedMovements - All movements from two players
      Returns:
      Movement conflicts in the form of PairNoOrder's of MovementDataModel's

    • movingInsideMovementPattern

      public static boolean movingInsideMovementPattern(MovementDataModel intendedMovement, CharacterEntity character, String hostID)
      Test if a character is moving outside their allowed movement patterns
      Parameters:
      intendedMovement - the intended movement
      character - The moving character
      hostID - the playerID of the hosting player
      Returns:
      true if moving outside allowed patterns, false otherwise

    • movingInsideBounds

      public static boolean movingInsideBounds(MovementDataModel intendedMovement, GridService gridService)
      Test if character is moving inside the grid.
      Parameters:
      intendedMovement - the movement
      gridService - grid service containing the grid
      Returns:
      the movement

    • validateMovingToSamePosition

      public static List<MovementDataModel> validateMovingToSamePosition(List<MovementDataModel> intendedMovements, List<CharacterEntity> characters)
      Test if multiple characters are moving to the same position.
      Parameters:
      intendedMovements - all movements
      characters - all characters
      Returns:
      all moves that are not to the same position

    • validateMovingToOccupiedPosition

      public static List<MovementDataModel> validateMovingToOccupiedPosition(List<MovementDataModel> intendedMovements, List<CharacterEntity> characters)
      Test if the characters are moving to a position that is already occupied.

      Moving to a position that would be freed in the same round is also forbidden.

      Parameters:
      intendedMovements - all movements
      characters - all characters
      Returns:
      all moves which are not trying to move to an occupied position

    • attackInsideBounds

      public static boolean attackInsideBounds(AttackDataModel intendedAttack, GridService gridService)
      Test if an attack is applied outside the grid.
      Parameters:
      intendedAttack - intended attack
      gridService - gridService containing the playing field
      Returns:
      true, if inside bounds, false otherwise

    • attackingInsideAttackPattern

      public static boolean attackingInsideAttackPattern(AttackDataModel attack, CharacterEntity attacker, String hostID)
      Test if character is attacking inside their allowed attack patterns.
      Parameters:
      attack - the attack
      attacker - The attacking character
      hostID - the playerID of the hosting player
      Returns:
      true, if attacking inside allowed attack patterns, else false
